7.23a

GENERAL

  • Neutral drops will now always drop only 3 items per tier, rather than having a chance to get more
  • Neutral drops no longer have an end period in terms of when they can drop, just a start period (now 5/15/25/40/70). Higher tier items will always roll first
  • Neutral drop rate changed from 10/5/2.5/1.25/etc to 9/6/3

ITEMS

IRON TALON
  • Cooldown increased from 20 to 25
OCEAN HEART
  • Health/Mana regen reduced from 10/5 to 6/3
  • All stats increased from 4 to 5
KEEN OPTIC
  • Mana regeneration reduced from 1.5 to 1.25
REPAIR KIT
  • Moved from Tier 2 to Tier 3
HELM OF THE UNDYING
  • Moved from Tier 2 to Tier 3
TOME OF AGHANIM
  • Removed
IMP CLAW
  • Critical Strike reduced from 1.6 to 1.4
  • Damage increased from 18 to 20
VAMBRACE
  • Moved from Tier 3 to Tier 2 (stats lowered to just the components of the recipe)
CLUMSY NET
  • Moved from Tier 3 to Tier 2
  • Mana regen reduced from 3 to 2
MIND BREAKER
  • Manabreak reduced from 30 to 20
  • Magic resistance increased from 15% to 25%
  • Mana steal now only has half effect on creeps
TIMELESS RELIC
  • Debuff duration amp reduced from 35% to 25%
  • Spell Amp increased from 10% to 15%
WITLESS SHAKO
  • Now provides +1000 Health and -400 Mana
SPELL PRISM
  • No longer has an active. Now provides 20% Cooldown Reduction, +12 All stats and +4 Mana Regen
ILLUSIONIST'S CAPE
  • Now increases damage of your player controlled units as well.
THE LEVELLER
  • No longer has a cleave or splash effect. Now has +25% Demolish
SEER STONE
  • Cast Range reduced from 500 to 450
  • Vision range reduced from 800 to 450
MIRROR SHIELD
  • No longer has a 75% chance, instead has a 4 second cooldown.
WOODLAND STRIDERS
  • Health regen increased from 50 to 70
BOOK OF THE DEAD
  • Cooldown increased from 75 to 90
  • Duration reduced from 90 to 75
  • Fixed previous summons not disappearing
PHOENIX ASH
  • No longer Gives +30 All stats.
  • Health restore reduced from 100% to 50%
  • Now refreshes your non-ultimate abilities upon triggering

HEROES

ANTI-MAGE
  • Agility gain reduced from 3.2 to 3.0
MANA BREAK
  • Mana Break reduced from 2/3/4/5% to 1/2/3/4%
CRYSTAL MAIDEN
  • Base mana regen from 1 to 1.5
ARCANE AURA
  • Arcane Aura magic resistance reduced from 4/6/8/10 to 5/6/7/8
  • Arcane Aura mana regen from 1/1.5/2/2.5 to 0.5/1/1.5/2
DROW RANGER
MULTISHOT
  • Multishot cooldown reduced from 32/28/24/20 to 26/24/22/20
MARKSMANSHIP
  • Marksmanship aura increased from 25/30/35 to 30/35/40
  • Marksmanship damage increased from 40/50/60 to 70/80/90
LONE DRUID
  • Spirit Bear base attack time increased from 1.65/1.55/1.45/1.35 to 1.7/1.6/1.5/1.4
TALENTS
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from -0.5 Spirit Bear Attack Time to -0.25
MORPHLING
  • Intelligence from 13 + 1.1 to 15 + 1.5
  • Base strength increased from 20 to 22
  • Attribute Shift stats increased from 1/3/5/7 to 3/5/7/9
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent from +10 Agility to +12
OUTWORLD DEVOURER
  • Intelligence increased from 28 + 3.5 to 30 + 4.2
  • Strength increased from 19 + 2.6 to 21 + 2.9
SANITY'S ECLIPSE
  • Sanity's Eclipse mana per charge increased from 30/40/50 to 40/50/60
  • Sanity's Eclipse multiplier increased from 0.4/0.5/0.6 to 0.5/0.6/0.7
RAZOR
  • Level 10 Agility reduced from 15 to 10
EYE OF THE STORM
  • Eye of the Storm passive shock damage reduced from 80/110/140 to 60/100/140
UNDYING
FLESH GOLEM
  • Flesh Golem slow from 30/35/40% to 40/45/50%
  • Flesh Golem strength multiplier from 30/40/50% to 40/50/60%
URSA
  • Base armor reduced by 1
EARTHSHOCK
  • Earthshock slow from 25/35/45/55% 10/25/40/55%
ENRAGE
  • Enrage cooldown increased from 50/40/30 to 70/50/30
VENGEFUL SPIRIT
  • Base agility reduced from 27 to 20 (base damage unchanged)
VENGEANCE AURA
  • Vengeance Aura Attack Range bonus from 60/100/140/180 to 60/90/120/150
TALENTS
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from +10 Attributes to +8
  • Level 20 Talent changed from Vengeance Aura Illusion Casts Spells to +200 Magic Missile Damage
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +400 Magic Missile Damage to Vengeance Aura Illusion Casts Spells

Source/Credits : https://www.dota2.com/patches/
